data.title: Aruá
data.subtitle: STM32 microcontolled system to monitor and control fish ponds water quality.

data.title: Moisturemeter P001
data.subtitle: Capacitive and low cost moisture meter microcontrolled by an ESP8266 built especially to monitor gardens.

data.title: Cutia
data.subtitle: Semi-autonomous ATMEGA32 controlled quadcopter made to recover the soil and reforest Amazon Rainforest devastated areas.

data.title: SIMBA
data.subtitle: A embedded system capable to supervise efficiency and quality in the juice production process and stablish connection between a balance and a filling machine.

data.title: DHT11 Api to STM32
data.subtitle: A DHT11 API adaptable for STM32FXXX MCUs and a DEMO application developed under the stack CubeMX + SW4STM32 + HAL.

data.title: STM32 Low-Power Modes
data.subtitle: A repository created to give an overview and an example application of the low-power modes of STM32F1 microcontroller family.

data.title: Filling Machine 2.0
data.subtitle: A ESP8266 microcontrolled system responsible for increase the pulp packs per hour productivity by 300% and for drastically decrease the operators effort.

data.title: GoogleSheets Api to ESP8266
data.subtitle: Controls an ESP8266 microcontroller to receive comma separated data via UART and send it to Google Sheets as a row with multiple columns.

data.title: Locall Platform
data.subtitle: The digital and non-profit platform to help small scale farmers, producers and service providers to promote consistent and endogenous local development by their own.

data.title: Ansof Logistics 2.0
data.subtitle: A Domain-Driven Design oriented platform (front Web + back PHP) to calculate best delivering routes according to vehicles capability, clients availability and so on.

data.title: MegaPool
data.subtitle: A Domain-Driven Design oriented platform (front Web + back PHP) to calculate best delivering routes according to vehicles capability, clients availability and so on.

data.title: Smart M2M
data.subtitle: A product composed by a GSM/GPRS/3G datalogger and a web platform to display devices data in dashboards with charts, tables, gauges, alerts, etc.

data.title: GE EasyReceiving
data.subtitle: A solution to the locomotives pieces receiving process at GE Transportation, designed during two weeks of Design Sprint guided by General Electrics designers, engineers and agile experts.

data.title: Sicoob Connection
data.subtitle: A solution to connect people and promote financial justice designed during a Design Sprint guided by Sicoob Credit Coop. and Raízen UX designers.
